Module com.example.c195project
Package helper

Class AppointmentsQuery

java.lang.Object
helper.AppointmentsQuery
public abstract class AppointmentsQuery extends Object
method used for query's to the database that have to do with the appointments table.
Author:
Anthony Collins

    • insert

      public static void insert(String title, String description, String location, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, LocalDateTime createDate, String createdBy, LocalDateTime lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID, String type) throws SQLException
      method used to insert appointments into the appointments table.
      Parameters:
      title - title of the appointment.
      description - description of the appointment.
      location - location of the appointment.
      start - start time of the appointment.
      end - end time of tha appointment.
      createDate - time and date of the appointment's creation.
      createdBy - who created teh appointment.
      lastUpdate - time and date the appointment was last updated.
      lastUpdatedBy - who the appointment was last updated by.
      customerID - customer ID of whom the appointment is scheduled for.
      userID - user ID of who is scheduling the appointment.
      contactID - contactID of the contact for the appointment.
      type - the type of appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • update

      public static void update(int appointmentID, String title, String description, String location, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID, String type) throws SQLException
      method used to insert appointments into the appointments table.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - appointment ID for the appointment being edited. the appointment ID is not editable.
      title - title of the appointment.
      description - description of the appointment.
      location - location of the appointment.
      start - start time of the appointment.
      end - end time of tha appointment.
      lastUpdatedBy - who the appointment was last updated by.
      customerID - customer ID of whom the appointment is scheduled for.
      userID - user ID of who is scheduling the appointment.
      contactID - contactID of the contact for the appointment.
      type - the type of appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • returnAppointmentID

      public static int returnAppointmentID(LocalDateTime start, int customerID) throws SQLException
      method to return an appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      start - start date and time of appointment.
      customerID - customer ID of the customer the appointment is scheduled for.
      Returns:
      returns an int of the appointment ID if found. If no appointment is found "-1" is returned.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • checkForOverlappingAddAppointments

      public static boolean checkForOverlappingAddAppointments(int customerID, LocalDateTime startScheduled, LocalDateTime endScheduled) throws SQLException
      method checks for overlapping appointments for a given customer when appointment is scheduled.
      Parameters:
      customerID - ID of customer appointment is being scheduled for
      startScheduled - scheduled start time of the appointment attempting to be scheduled.
      endScheduled - scheduled end time of the appointment attempting to be scheduled.
      Returns:
      returns a boolean if true. if no overlapping appointments and false if one is found.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • checkForOverlappingEditAppointments

      public static boolean checkForOverlappingEditAppointments(int customerID, LocalDateTime startScheduled, LocalDateTime endScheduled) throws SQLException
      method checks for overlapping appointments for a given customer when appointment is updated.
      Parameters:
      customerID - ID of customer appointment is being scheduled for
      startScheduled - scheduled start time of the appointment attempting to be scheduled.
      endScheduled - scheduled end time of the appointment attempting to be scheduled.
      Returns:
      returns a boolean of value true if no overlapping appointments and false if one is found.
      Throws:
      SQLException

      public static int reportQuantityQuery(String month, String type) throws SQLException
